posts.content: TURNUP ASSIST REQUEST45700This is a turnup assist.  The Dispatch is being set by FSPM.  This is a network cutover job to happen on day 2 of a cabling project roughly 2-3 hours from the start time.  As such please arrange for a remote resource to be available on the noted date, around 1130pm.  please reference the guide published by engineering. There is a check in / check out template in addition to the photo and notes requirements.
posts.author: Amber Hodgson
